sbw.architecture.bus.protocol.A_Request

Packages that use A_Request
Package
Description
sbw.architecture.bus
Contains the elements of a general-purpose communication bus.
sbw.architecture.bus.protocol
Contains the elements of the communication protocols for a bus.
sbw.architecture.support
Contains support classes shared by the overall system.

    Method
    Description
    Response
    BusManager.submitRequest(A_Request request)
    Submits a request to the bus, which will be sent to the component indicated by the identifier in the request.

  • Uses of A_Request in sbw.architecture.bus.protocol

    Subclasses of A_Request in sbw.architecture.bus.protocol
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    A_RequestFollowup
    Defines the shared elements of a bus request, which defines a desired action to be considered by a servicer on a bus with respect to a previous request.
    class 
    RequestCancel
    Defines a request to cancel an existing request on a servicer immediately without any opportunity to shut it down gracefully.
    class 
    RequestInform<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>>
    Defines a request to a servicer to supply arbitrary data to be returned to the requester in a visitor bucket.
    class 
    RequestService<_PAYLOAD_ extends A_Payload<?,?>>
    Defines a request to have a servicer do something with a given payload at a defined.
    class 
    RequestTerminate
    Defines a request to cancel an existing request on a servicer by shutting it down gracefully and canceling it as soon as possible.
